# Scripts

Sequence of scripts:

```{r, echo=FALSE, fig.width=2, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}

             "replicateOno.Rmd",
             "readAhles.Rmd",
             "readTager.Rmd",
             "reshapeOno.Rmd",
             "combineData.Rmd",
             "runMetaAnalysis.Rmd",
             "epilogue.Rmd")
library(devtools)
source_gist("https://gist.github.com/benjamin-chan/f7dc918e2607b412ccf5", quiet=TRUE)
flow(scripts)
```
